Earlier this week, Blizzard announced what's coming up in Season 3 of Diablo 4, and underneath the mountain's worth of lore and loot updates, there was the surprisingly good news that WASD key controls were finally being added to help provide even more accurate and precise movement in the game over the series' traditional mouse clicks. Not that any of them could decide how to actually pronounce WASD when it came to talking about them on last night's Developer Update stream, though, as there were competing cries of "was-dee", "wased" and "double-you-ey-es-dee" all over the shop as they debated this clearly very "controversial topic" live on air. Read on for more details about what they're hoping to achieve with WASD controls in the game, but more importantly: how do you pronounce WASD? Let's get a poll up asap.  
Read more
articles.title: Diablo 4's Season 3 developer update reignites "controversial topic" of how to pronounce WASD

articles.author: Alice Bell
articles.description:
About 20 years ago, a travel company declared this Monday just gone, the 15th, to be the most depressing day of the year. They call it Blue January. Enter yet more studio layoffs. 2023's trend continues with Dead By Daylight developer Behaviour Interactive getting rid of about 45 staff, per Kotaku, while CI Games has laid off 10% of its workforce, including from Lords Of The Fallen studio Hexworks and Sniper Ghost Warrior studio Underdog (via GI.Biz).
Read more
articles.title: More layoffs as Behaviour Interactive and CI Games "adjust scope" and make "optimisations"

articles.author: Katharine Castle
articles.description:
Back in the depths of 2023's February Steam Next Fest, Roots Of Yggdrasil was one of a handful of games that really caught my attention. Not because it was another beautiful-looking deckbuilder (though that does seem to be a steadily growing niche of mine these days), or because its colourful, inkwash visuals had the air of a Norse-flavoured Okami about them (though it did also help). Rather, it was the way its roguelike foundations meshed with its freeform, but still very goal-driven turn-based building systems, giving you drive and purpose in your construction choices, while also being light and chill, with just the right amount of existential threat nipping at your heels.
It struck me that if, say, my best puzzle strategy bud Dorfromantik was ever turned into a roguelike, this is probably a good approximation of what it would look and feel like, which is, frankly, yep, I'd like that game right now, please. Happily, with Roots Of Yggdrasil now approaching its early access launch on January 24th, I'm very happy to report that it's come on leaps and bounds since that Next Fest demo. This is already a very moreish and polished building game, and I've been struggling to tear myself away from it as I guide my longboat of magic Vikings away from their impending Ragnarok.
Read more
articles.title: Roots Of Yggdrasil's gorgeous roguelike citybuilding is a real grower

articles.author: Alice O'Connor
articles.description:
If you want to change your Destiny 2 wizard's appearance, the only current method is to stash your wizard's gear in your vault, create a whole new wizard with a new look (after deleting the old to free a character slot, if needed), grab your old wizard's gear, then optionally replay any story bits to catch up. The MMOFPS has no barber, no surgeon, it's new character or nothing. After six years (longer, if you count the first game), Bungie are finally planning to change this. An upcoming update will introduce the ability to change your character's look—within limits. For drastic changes, you would still need a new wizard.
Read more
articles.title: Destiny 2 will finally let you change your character's appearance, with one big limitation

articles.author: Ed Thorn
articles.description:
After quite a while using the Fnatic Streak65, a 60% keyboard with Cherry brown switches, I have moved on from fruit (technically drupe, according to Google) and into a vegetable era. My Streak's brown switches became a bit loud and quite rattly, which, as someone with hearing declared by an audiologist to be so sensitive that I give myself tinnitus, started to get to me. 


So I type this to you now as someone who's graduated to Kailh low profile switches, which is proving as nutritious for my finger pads as I'd imagine its leafy homophone would be. Here's hoping that there's more low profile mechanical keebs out there in a few years, as the options seem very limited at the mo.

 
Read more
articles.title: Sorry fruit keyboards, I am now a vegetable keyboard person

articles.author: Graham Smith
articles.description:
Senua's Saga: Hellblade 2 was featured in this evening's Xbox Developer Direct. Ninja Theory gave a further glimpse of the things they show when talking about Hellblade: motion capture, graphical fidelity, mental health representation, and stabbing. They also provided a release date: May 21st, 2024.

 
Read more
articles.title: Senua's Saga: Hellblade 2 will release on May 21st, 2024

articles.author: Graham Smith
articles.description:
Tonight's Xbox Developer Direct brought an update on Avowed, Obsidian's first-person fantasy RPG. A new trailer provided a substantial look at combat, including pistols, dual-wielding swords and wands, as well as a slightly updated release window: this autumn. 

 
Read more
articles.title: Obsidian's first-person fantasy RPG Avowed is coming this autumn

articles.author: Graham Smith
articles.description:
The leaks were right. Machine Games' next Nazi-biffer is called Indiana Jones And The Great Circle. It was shown for the first time during this evening's Xbox Developer Direct, where we got to see first-person punching and whipping, some tomb raiding, and plenty of Indy's face in cutscenes. 

We also got a release window: 2024.

 
Read more
articles.title: Indiana Jones And The Great Circle is first-person, stealthy, and coming 2024

articles.author: Graham Smith
articles.description:
Today's Xbox Developer Direct stream offered updates on some of 2024's biggest Microsoft games, including MachineGames' Indiana Jones And The Great Circle, Obsidian's Avowed and Ninja Theory's Senua's Saga: Hellblade 2. If you missed the stream and want a quick roundup of all the news, games, release dates and trailers featured, we've gathered it all together in this post.

 
Read more
articles.title: Everything announced at today's Xbox Developer Direct 2024

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
I think we're well into "milking the gimmick" territory for bodycam horror games now - last week's Digested may have been one giant snake too many - but Zoochosis does have the additional virtue of being heavily inspired by the cute doggy scene from The Thing. And also, perhaps, Five Nights At Freddy's.
In this latest, gruesome escapade from Sparky Marky developers Clapperheads, you are a zookeeper working the night shift. Your job, initially, is to feed the incarcerated animals and clean up after them while giving them an occasional pat on the nose. But Something Is Wrong. Giraffes aren't supposed to have that many legs, or mandibles. Kangaroos aren't supposed to stick to the ceiling, or have several sets of teeth.
  
Read more
articles.title: Animal-loving horror Zoochosis is an open homage to The Thing

articles.author: Alice Bell
articles.description:
Games Done Quick is busy raising loads of money for the Prevent Cancer Foundation, so we have a little chat about speedrunning, speedrunners, the benefits of breaking the game vs. the quality of a purist speedrun, and also a dog. We don't have a Nate this week, but James has been playing Apelegs again and offers a surprising self-assessment of how he feels like he's past his Apex Legends prime, and how confidence is a really necessary skill in competitive shooters. Worth tuning in for a listen to that.
Read more
articles.title: The Electronic Wireless Show S3 Episode 2: speedrunning dogs for fun and (charity) profit

articles.author: James Archer
articles.description:
It’s been two whole graphics card generations since Nvidia last tried the whole Super-branded refresh thing, and from what I recall of that sweaty 2019 summer, most of the updated RTX 20 series cards were meek rejigs of GPUs that didn’t really need replacing in the first place. Having tried the new RTX 4070 Super, though, it looks like Nvidia aren’t just redeeming the Super badge – they might just right the wrongs of the RTX 40 family as a whole.
Read more
articles.title: Nvidia GeForce RTX 4070 Super review: what the RTX 4070 should have been

articles.author: Alice O'Connor
articles.description:
Four months after the troubled launch of Payday 3, developers Starbreeze have announced they've formed a "strike team of veteran developers" with the goal of bringing it "up to where it will meet your expectations". The cooperative heist FPS got off to a right bumpy start when the ever-unpopular decision to only be playable if you're online collided with server issues that saw Starbreeze take the game down for a while. Since then, it has failed to rise above 'Mixed' review rating on Steam, not helped by Starbreeze releasing a £15 DLC pack when many players were unhappy with the game they'd just bought for £35.
Read more
articles.title: Payday 3 forms "strike team" focused on making the co-op FPS finally "meet your expectations"

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
Today's the day of Xbox Developer Direct 2024, a select showcase of forthcoming Microsoft-published games, from sorcerous RPGs to intricate strategy games, which begins at 12pm PT, 3pm ET and 8pm UK. Wait, stop! Come back here, you silly goose. You don't need to go anywhere. I've embedded the livestream below, together with the key things you need to know about the games in question.
Read more
articles.title: All today's Xbox Developer Direct 2024 streams in one place

articles.author: Ed Thorn
articles.description:
Your favourite beaver-based colony sim Timberborn's latest big update has arrived, and honestly, I'd say your poor beavers won't appreciate it one bit. The main reason being, it adds a new ecological hazard called Badwater, that doesn't only make your water bad, but your crops and beavers at risk of being bad. Still, there are plenty of new buildings to help you harness the power of the stanky water and errr, exercise halls for beavers to get their sweat on. I wouldn't recommend they rehydrate with the bad water, though.
Read more
articles.title: Beaver colony sim Timberborn's biggest ever update brings a tidal wave of pollution and disease

articles.author: Alice Bell
articles.description:
As we all know, I like vampire stories, and I like different takes on vampire stories. Yesterday Edwin dangled an upcoming visual novel called Vampire Therapist in front of my nose. I am intrigued, also because I appreciate a Ronseal approach to titles. In Vampire Therapist, out on Steam this June 17th, you play Sam, a vampire who becomes a therapist to other vampires. So the title works twice!
Read more
articles.title: Upcoming visual novel Vampire Therapist mixes vampires and dark humour with CBT

articles.author: Alice Bell
articles.description:
Readers may remember how much I liked Turnip Boy Commits Tax Evasion, principally because of how funny it was. It was an intelligent and somewhat loving take on a Zelda-y RPG - a small town hero gets a sword and goes on a rampage fighting some bosses - except the main character is a turnip. And also he tears up any paperwork handed to him. Turnip Boy Robs A Bank follows directly on from his Tax Evasion, and it's not quite as funny or as focused, but it's also an entirely different genre of game, and I have a huge amount respect for that.
Read more
articles.title: Turnip Boy Robs A Bank review: continuing Turnip Boy's story in slightly chaotic roguelite style

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
Wake up, mayflies! FatShark have detailed the closed alpha for Warhammer: Vermintide 2's long-awaited Versus mode, in which the doughty Ubersreik Five go up against four player-controlled Skaven Pactsworn (translation: ratty supervillains) in addition to the rank-and-file AI-controlled rodent hordes. The alpha will launch in the "near future", and sounds like just the dollop of rancid PvP shenanigans this lapsed Elven ranger needs to re-install one of the all-time great Warhammer adaptations, which unaccountably isn't on our list of the best co-op games or the best multiplayer games on PC. You got something against horrible giant rats, Ed Thorn?

 
Read more
articles.title: Left 4 Dead's ratty cousin Vermintide 2 is finally getting a Versus mode, with alpha tests in the "near future"

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
Puzzle game classic Threes is getting a Steam PC launch to celebrate its 10th anniversary, developer Asher Vollmer has announced. The release date is 6th February, and here's the Steam page. The new version adds controller and Steam cloud support together with achievements and leaderboards. Given its mobile origins, it should scrub up nicely on Steam Deck.

 
Read more
articles.title: Puzzle game classic Threes gets surprise Steam PC release in February

articles.author: Will Judd
articles.description:
The Cooler Master NR200 is a brilliant small form factor PC case - and now it's heavily discounted at Amazon UK. This is a Mini ITX case which allows 360-degree access to the components therein, with space for a 240mm AiO or 155mm high air cooler, triple-slot graphics cards up to 330mm in length and seven fans in total. It's often as high as £94, but for a little while now it's been available for £70 - a great price that makes it well worth recommending to you, dear RPS reader. 
Read more
articles.title: My favourite small form factor PC case is down to a low price on Amazon UK

articles.author: Will Judd
articles.description:
Intel's Core i3 12100F is a surprisingly viable gaming CPU, with four Golden Cove P-cores and eight threads with DDR5 and PCIe 5.0 support, all for under £100. Don't be put off by 'Core i3' either - this model is similar in speed to the last-gen Core i5 11600K and not too far behind the Core i7 10700K, such is the leap forward Intel made with its 12th-gen CPU architecture. Today this processor is even cheaper than normal too, with prices dropping to £88 at Ebuyer in the UK. 
Read more
articles.title: Intel's Core i3 12100F is a value champion CPU for gaming - and it's down to £88

articles.author: Matt Jarvis
articles.description:
The meme that willed itself into existence, Cult of the Lamb’s ‘sex update’, is upon us. The roguelite cultist sim’s Sins of the Flesh update is live now, bringing a whole bunch of new items, systems and other additions, as well as its promised woo-hooing.
Read more
articles.title: Cult of the Lamb’s Sins of the Flesh - aka the sex update - has come

articles.author: Matt Jarvis
articles.description:
Destructive game-show shooter The Finals has received its biggest update yet. Patch 1.5 arrives with a litany of bug fixes, balance changes and more, along with the introduction of a brand new mode - the game’s first time-limited variant, as well as its first mode for solo players.
Read more
articles.title: The Finals’ 1.5 update introduces the multiplayer shooter’s first time-limited mode, a solo free-for-all

articles.author: Matt Jarvis
articles.description:
A massive update for Starfield, cramming in over 100 fixes and other improvements, has been delayed. Originally due to hit Steam’s beta branch today, January 17th, the patch is now expected to arrive later this week - but Bethesda aren’t sure exactly when, just yet.
Read more
articles.title: Starfield’s biggest update yet has been delayed by a few days

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
Larian CEO Swen Vincke has been reading Ubisoft director of subscriptions Philippe Tremblay's thoughts from yesterday about how players need to "get comfortable" with renting their games as a package, rather than "having and owning" an individual copy. His broad takeaway is: that ain't it, chief. In a social media thread today, Vincke wrote that "it's going to be a lot harder to get good content if subscription becomes the dominant model and a select group gets to decide what goes to market and what not". He feels that "direct from developer to players is the way". As such you shouldn't expect Baldur's Gate 3, Divinity: Original Sin 2 or any other Larian RPGs to join the Game Pass bandwagon anytime soon.

 
Read more
articles.title: A wholly subscription-driven games industry would be "savage", says Larian CEO

articles.author: Matt Jarvis
articles.description:
A new farming game is planting the seeds of recent PC hits like Stardew Valley, Human: Fall Flat, Satisfactory and, yes, Minecraft and hoping to have them grow into an entertaining co-op offering that’s as cozy as it is chaotic.
Read more
articles.title: Physics-y farming game Southfield mixes Stardew Valley with Human: Fall Flat for chaotic co-op crop-picking

articles.author: Alice O'Connor
articles.description:
Last time, you decided that Planescape: Torment's Litany Of Curses is better than Half-Life's Snarks. I hadn't that expected that snark-off to be so one-sided but Morte's cussing taunt took 80% of the votes. You have to forgive Snarks for snapping at your finger one day, Gordon, they're just little critters. Onwards! This week, I ask you to choose between nostalgia and new styles, ya? What's better: playing on an old patch, or asymmetrical outfits?
Read more
articles.title: What's better: playing on an old patch or asymmetrical outfits?

articles.author: Katharine Castle
articles.description:
When cute crafting RPG Bandle Tale: A League Of Legends Story was first announced at the end of last year, I don't think I really appreciated the fact it was going to be the next game from the devs behind mortuary farming-me-do Graveyard Keeper. I keep turning this fact over in my head as I watch Lazy Bear Games' associate producer Vlada Redko play a portion of Bandle Tale over Discord for me, with creative director Nikita Kulaga and Riot Forge's creative director Rowan Parker telling me about what's happening onscreen in front of me. As Redko explores the whimsical, knitting-themed city of Bandle as one of League Of Legends' tiny fluffy Yordle creatures, it is, to put it lightly, quite the tonal shift from their previous work. But don't let its cute looks fool you.
This is a crafting RPG with a ferociously long set of skill trees to master, with 40-60 hours' worth of new abilities to learn, objects to construct, errands to run, friends to enlist and - crucially - parties to throw. For in the Bandle woods of Runeterra, life's problems are solved by having a good old fashioned boogie, including the rather urgent issue of fixing the world's portal network, which has collapsed in a mysterious accident. It may have a softer, fluffier-looking surface than Graveyard Keeper, but underneath it looks as though there's just as much to dig into here, so here's what I've learned so far ahead of its release on February 21st.
Read more
articles.title: The next League Of Legends spin-off is a deep and crafty blend of Stardew, Spiritfarer and Animal Crossing

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
Take the little boy with lancing white eyes from Playdead's Limbo, ruthlessly clone him a few dozen times (an extremely Playdead thing to do) and herd all the clones into a world redolent of Klei's Don't Starve, and you have something like The Tribe Must Survive. Developed by apparent Macbeth fans Walking Tree Games GmbH, and published by Starbreeze, it's a heavily horror-themed tribe management sim with a roguelike campaign loop, set in what the developers are calling the "Lovecraftian Stone Age", with flagrant disregard for my nerves. Does the Lovecraftian Stone Age feature any actual walking trees? We'll find out on February 22nd, when the game launches into early access.

 
Read more
articles.title: "Lovecraftian Stone Age" town builder The Tribe Must Survive hits early access in February

articles.author: Alice Bell
articles.description:
I enjoy Games Done Quick, an organisation that raises money for charity (this year is the Prevent Cancer Foundation) by playing games at peak efficiency. If you've never watched it before, I recommend loading up the Twitch stream at about 1am and sort of gently dissociating while someone plays an 80s NES game you've never heard of. Speaking of, one of the headline acts for this year's stream - which is running through to this Sunday 21st - was Peanut Butter, a shiba inu trained to press buttons on command, "playing" a NES game that came out in 1985. Although Peanut Butter obeyed his training, some technical issues colluded to snatch a world best time from him - but he raised many thousands of dollars, so good for him.
Peanut Butter is the latest high tide line in the efforts to put more weird and difficult hurdles between you and the controls of games when speedrunning or streaming them. And I must ask: where next? A cat? A snapping turtle biting pressure sensors? A Grey parrot to play a game without any input from you at all? Where will this madness end!?
Read more
articles.title: I regret to inform you the Games Done Quick dog did not get a world record speedrun time

articles.author: Alice O'Connor
articles.description:
What's the most 90s way you can market your retro-styled prequel to a 90s mech shooter? Other than an Acclaim-style stunt where you offer people £500 to tattoo their baby's face with the game logo, I'd say perhaps releasing a Quake mod. So here's Episode Enyo, a prequel to upcoming "biopunk" hack 'n' slasher Slave Zero X, now available as a Bethesda-approved free add-on inside Quake.
Read more
articles.title: This free Quake mod is also a prequel to hack 'n' slash Slave Zero X, which is a prequel to a 1999 mech game

articles.author: Ed Thorn
articles.description:
Hey! How would you like to contribute to the downfall of society? I do so by regularly tuning into Love Island and/or Married At First Sight. For those of you who'd like to do your part in videogame form, dev_hell looks to be the answer. It's a first-person deckbuilding roguelike where you play as a software developer employed by a shady corporation to "reshape the future", and it's giving off strong whiffs of Inscryption. As much as I know dev_hell will be incredibly unsettling… I'm in.
 Read more
articles.title: This roguelike deckbuilder is software development meets Inscryption

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
A round of videogame company layoffs following a period of "unsustainable" spending? It must be a Wednesday. Swedish conglomerate Thunderful Group AB - whose corporate possessions include Somerville developer Jumpship and several teams working on the SteamWorld games - have announced that they will lay off around 20 percent of their staff as part of a restructuring program that "stems primarily from over-investments made in the last few years".
Read more
articles.title: SteamWorld owners Thunderful to fire 20% of staff due to "over-investments made in the last few years"

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
What the hell is going on in Diablo 4 these days? "Devilish machinations", would you believe. Blizzard have formally unveiled the brooding action-RPG's Season 3, aka Season of the Construct, which launches at 6pm GMT and 10am PST on January 23rd, and features a new quest line in which you investigate an ancient technology, the Loom, created by the mage Zoltun Kulle, which has now been purloined by the demon Malphas.
Along the way, you'll both fight deadly arcane constructs (fantasy robots), and enlist one called Ayuzhan as your Seneschal Companion. These machinations aren't just devilish, in other words. They are literal machinations, with all manner of automated foe awaiting beneath the deserts of Kehjistan.

 
Read more
articles.title: Diablo 4 Season 3 revealed, introducing WASD controls and a customisable robot pal

articles.author: Katharine Castle
articles.description:
As the release of the (deep breath) Tomb Raider I-III Remastered Starring Lara Croft approaches (yes, that is its full and official Steam title) on February 14th, developers Aspyr have detailed some of the game's new features over on the PlayStation Blog, and how they've approached bringing the art, controls and effects up to date for 2023. Personally, I'm extremely pleased to see they've added a photo mode, for example, as I spent inordinate amounts of time making Lara do creepy side-eye smiles during inappropriate Shadow Of The Tomb Raider scenes. But I'm also heartened to see they've kept in the original tank controls as an optional extra, alongside a more modern control scheme to make them more approachable. 
Read more
articles.title: Don't worry, Lara's tank controls are still an option in Tomb Raider I-III Remastered

articles.author: Graham Smith
articles.description:
Dave The Diver was one of last year's surprise hits, but though some called it an indie game, it was actually the work of Mintrocket, a subsidiary of Korean publisher Nexon. Now Mintrocket have announced their next game and it seems less likely to cause such confusion. It's called Wakerunners, and it's a team-based "battle action game" about heroes smashing at each other.

It'll have a demo in Steam Next Fest next month and there's a teaser trailer below.

 
Read more
articles.title: Dave The Diver studio's next game is a team-based PvP arena battler

articles.author: Graham Smith
articles.description:
Prison Architect 2 was announced earlier this evening and will switch the carceral management sim to 3D when it releases on March 26th.

It'll also have robust mod support, with "a mod editor built-in for PC players", according to game director Gaz Wright.

 
Read more
articles.title: Prison Architect 2 will support mods with a built-in editor on PC

articles.author: Graham Smith
articles.description:
Top Spin is returning. The 2K Sports tennis series last received an entry back in 2011, which didn't come to PC, but while there's no confirmed platforms for Top Spin 2K25, I choose to live in hope. You'll find a teaser trailer below.

 
Read more
articles.title: TopSpin 2K25 announced, 2K Sports series returning after 13 years

articles.author: Graham Smith
articles.description:
Against The Storm left early access late last year, but has just now received its first major post-release patch. Update 1.1 "isn’t as spectacular" as its developers had first hoped, but it does buff the roguelite citybuilder with som new art, UI improvements and quality-of-life tweaks, as well as new orders to make early stage settlement building "a little more interesting."

 
Read more
articles.title: Against The Storm's update 1.1 is out, making the early game more interesting

articles.author: Will Judd
articles.description:
Arctic does a really nice line of CPU coolers, including this 240mm AiO that's discounted by 23% on Amazon US today. That brings it down to $75, a great price for the renowned Liquid Freezer II 240, one of the best-performing all-in-one liquid coolers on the market and a fine complement to any high-end or mid-range gaming CPU. To get this deal, just tick the 23% off coupon on the product page. 
Read more
articles.title: Pick up Arctic's legendary Liquid Freezer II 240 AiO for $75 at Amazon US with this 23% off coupon

articles.author: Will Judd
articles.description:
Asus' Zephyrus G14 is one of the nicest gaming laptop designs I've ever tested, and now this high-end RTX 4070 and Ryzen 9 7940HS equipped model is $450 off at Best Buy in the US. This spec also includes 16GB of DDR5 RAM and a 1TB NVMe SSD, making for a powerful machine that is still portable thanks to its 14-inch frame with a 2560x1600 165Hz IPS display. 
Read more
articles.title: This 14-inch Asus RTX 4070 laptop is $450 off at Best Buy

articles.author: Will Judd
articles.description:
AMD's flagship RDNA 2 graphics card, the RX 6900 XT, continues to drop in price over in the US. Right now you can pick this once-fastest-ever Radeon GPU for just $500 when you buy an open box model from Newegg. That's outstanding, given that this card cost twice as much when it debuted in 2020. 
This is the fancy AsRock Phantom Gaming D model too, which brings a snazzy design and a faster 2340MHz boost clock (versus 2250MHz on the vanilla spec). 
Read more
articles.title: Get AMD's former fastest graphics card for $500 at Newegg when you buy an open box model

articles.author: Will Judd
articles.description:
Good news, everyone! One of the best PC gaming handhelds, the Asus ROG Ally, is done to just £599 at Currys in the UK for the higher-powered Z1 Extreme edition. This represents a £100 discount over its launch price and is a good value for a premium handheld that outperforms the Steam Deck and Steam Deck OLED while having a higher-res and higher refresh rate 1080p 120Hz display. 
Read more
articles.title: The Asus ROG Ally handheld has dropped to £599 in the UK

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
Back in December, Creative Assembly posted a lengthy apology to players for their recent handling of the Total War strategy series, in particular Total War: Warhammer 3 and Total War: Pharoah. Seeking to smooth down feathers ruffled by overpricing and buggy launches, to pick out two of the biggest fan complaints, the developers offered to - amongst other things - make Pharoah’s first paid DLC pack a free update. 
That free update is now upon us, miladies and milords. Available January 25th, it's called High Tides, and introduces two new playable factions with their own units and gods and some additional campaign mechanics. Here’s a trailer.

 
Read more
articles.title: Total War: Pharaoh's High Tides update, previously a paid DLC pack, will release for free on Jan 25th

articles.author: Katharine Castle
articles.description:
After teasing a 3D sequel when Prison Architect received its final update last May, developers Double Eleven and publishers Paradox Interactive have announced that, yep, Prison Architect 2 is indeed a thing that is happening - and in 3D, no less. Prisons will now have multiple floors to police, as well as a whole new inmate behaviour system to navigate along the way that will feed into gang warfare, escapes and other budding management problems. It's coming out surprisingly soon, too, with its reveal trailer dating it for March 26th.  
Read more
articles.title: Prison Architect 2 is official, bringing Paradox's jail management sim to 3D

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
Stalker 2: Heart Of Chornobyl's release date is September 5th 2024, GSC Game World have announced, as the developers make some final adjustments to a post-apocalyptic FPS that was revealed way back in 2010 and has been racked by more than its fair share of setbacks and changes of circumstances. They've published a new trailer to mark the occasion, in which a group of the game's quarantine zone mercenaries squat around a campfire, supping mugs of what probably isn't cocoa, and listening to guitar music. It strikes a fitting note of world-weariness.
Read more
articles.title: S.T.A.L.K.E.R. 2 release date pushed back again to September 2024 to fix "technical imperfections"

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: V úterý 23. ledna proběhl první den setkání CSNOG, které je zaměřeno na provozovatele internetových sítí. Mluvilo se především o budování anycastových sítí, současných bezpečnostních hrozbách a měření výkonu.
articles.title: Testujte síťové prostředí pořádně, jinak vám vyjdou nesmysly (CSNOG 2024)

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jiří Sluka)
articles.description: V pravidelné středeční softwarové sondě si představíme nástroj pro monitorování systémových zdrojů v GNOME shell, naimportujeme si secrets z GCP nebo AWS do Sealed Secrets a budeme snadno přepínat mezi konfiguracemi gitu.
articles.title: Softwarová sklizeň (24. 1. 2024): monitorujte systémové zdroje

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Luděk Šťastný)
articles.description: Pokud se zajímáte o amatérskou astronomii, máte v Linuxu k dispozici celou paletu pěkných a použitelných nástrojů. Ukážu vám ještě jeden, který má velmi pěkný grafický výstup a navíc obrovský katalog hvězd.
articles.title: Gaia Sky: počítačové planetárium nejen pro potěchu oka

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Pavel Tišnovský)
articles.description: Projekt MicroPython máme spojený s představou varianty jazyka Python určené pro běh na různých mikrořadičích s omezeným výkonem i malou kapacitou. Ovšem ze stejných důvodů může být MicroPython použit ve webovém prohlížeči.
articles.title: MicroPython ve webovém prohlížeči: lehkotonážní varianta k Pyodide

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Filip Zatloukal)
articles.description: Operační systém openSUSE Leap 16 bude založen na nové platformě SUSE Adaptable Linux Platform (ALP). Podle vyjádření šéfa Canonicalu bude Ubuntu 24.04 LTS mít podporu 12 let. Vyšel nový SparkyLinux se správcem oken MLVWM.
articles.title: openSUSE Leap na nové platformě, Ubuntu s podporou na 12 let

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: ČD - Telematika)
articles.description: V dnešním ohlédnutí za uplynulým týdnem odhalíme nové informace týkající se incidentu s počítačovým červem Stuxnet, podíváme se na kloub Androgh0st malware a popíšeme pár nových zranitelností Google Chrome, SSH a SonicWall.
articles.title: Postřehy z bezpečnosti: tvář Stuxnetu odhalena

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Redakce)
articles.description: Chcete se začít vzdělávat v oboru a někam se posunout? MPSV spustilo Databázi kurzů digitálního vzdělávání a uhradí vám až 82 % kurzovného. Máme pro vás několik školení týkajících se Linuxu a počítačových sítí.
articles.title: Staňte se linuxákem, síťařem a hackerem, úřad práce vám na to přispěje

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Vylepšení enginu Servo pro embedded aplikace, podpora vypnutí grafického enginu na RDNA3 Radeonech při běhu ROCm, Hangover míří k podpoře RISC-V, KDE vylepšuje neceločíselné škálování.
articles.title: Microsoft zvyšuje minimum na 16 GB RAM kvůli AI, FreeRDP vyřešilo problémy s Waylandem

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Redakce)
articles.description: Po delší odmlce si dnes povíme o návratnosti investice do FVE. Chceme spočítat návratnost z reálných dat z více než dvouletého provozu FVE a vyhodnotit správnost počátečních odhadů návratnosti.
articles.title: Střípky solárního barona: vyhodnocení návratnosti

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Stát se rozhodl zase trochu nakopnout koně a vyrazit směrem k přechodu státní správy na IPv6 a technologie související. Začíná resuscitace již X-krát mrtvého pacienta, tentokrát doufejme úspěšná.
articles.title: Zavádění IPv6 zase připomíná multidimenzionální problém (ne)svižnosti státní správy

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Náhledy obrázků a popis hesla jsou nově ve Firefoxu 122 zobrazovány u výsledků vyhledávání v našeptávači, jak to známe u prohlížečů na bázi projektu Chromium. Vylepšena je kvalita překladu stránek, neměli bychom už vídat to, kdy obsah stránky při překladu zmizí, nebo se rozbije příslušný widget.
articles.title: Vyšel Firefox 122 s náhledy obrázků v našeptávači výsledků vyhledávání

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: V rámci BSD se vede diskuse, kterou Linux zažil před řadou měsíců. Diskutuje se o vpuštění Rustu do základu systému a o výhodnosti takové změny. Vývojář Alan Somers vše v sobotu sepsal do přehledu podle jednotlivých částí systému.
articles.title: Vývojáři FreeBSD diskutují zavedení jazyka Rust

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Tomáš Heřmánek)
articles.description: Přemýšleli jste někdy nad tím, jak zautomatizovat a centralizovat správu rolí v PostgreSQL prostřednictvím napojení na externího autentizačního providera, např. Active Directory? Ve středu 24. ledna 2024 na bezplatném webináři vás celou touto problematikou provede zkušený lektor Jakub Zemanek. Ukáže vám možnosti a způsoby napojení na GSSAPI, včetně automatizace přidávání rolí na základě skupin v Active Directory nebo FreeIPA, včetně praktické ukázky.
articles.title: Webináře zdarma - PostgreSQL a Zabbbix

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Populární službě Trello unikla databáze uživatelů, která čítá 15 milionů položek. Útočník vystupující pod jménem emo celou databázi nabízí k prodeji a tvrdí, že obsahuje e-mailové adresy, uživatelská jména, skutečná jména a další podrobnosti o účtu. Zatím nic nenaznačuje tomu, že by ze služby unikla hesla. Data unikla 16. ledna letošního roku.
articles.title: Službě Trello unikla databáze 15 milionů uživatelů

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Společnost Seagate završila skoro 15 let běžící vývoj technologie heat-assisted magnetic recording (HAMR) a její první disk míří na trh, konkrétně model Exos s kapacitou 30 TB. Počítá přitom se stejnou životností jako u standardních pevných disků, které jsou nyní na trhu.
articles.title: Seagate Exos 30TB, první disk s HAMR jde do prodeje

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Pro Fedoru 40 bylo navrženo používat nástroj iotop-c místo iotop. Oba nástroje zobrazují IO aktivitu podobně jako top či htop aktivitu CPU. Ale iotop v Pythonu je prakticky deset let neaktualizovaný. Oproti tomu iotop-c je aktivně vyvíjen a je napsán v C a u jeho zrodu stál Tomáš Matějíček.
articles.title: Fedora 40 bude používat iotop-c místo iotop

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Andrea Righi z Canonicalu o svátcích napsal pro zábavu externí plánovač CPU linuxového jádra v Rustu sched-ext. Ten je kupodivu pro některé zátěže (například hry) lepší než ten výchozí v linuxovém jádře a to včetně novinky z 6.6 EEVDF.
articles.title: Plánovač CPU v Rustu je lepší než ten výchozí v linuxovém jádře

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Prohlížeč Brave odstraní striktní ochranu před otisky prohlížeče. Jednak to rozbíjí spoustu webových stránek a také to používá pouze asi jen 0,5 % uživatelů.
articles.title: Brave odstraní striktní ochranu před otisky

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Jens Axboe vylepšil dva IO plánovače MQ-Deadline a BFQ tak že dosahují lepšího výkonu. Na rychlém NVMe zařízení dosahuje nyní Deadline 2,4× více IOPS a BFQ 2,7× více IOPS.
articles.title: IO plánovače Deadline a BFQ budou zrychleny více než 2×

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: johny)
articles.description: S novou verziou vývojovej platformy .NET 8 vyšiel aj jazyk C# 12. Na rozdiel od posledných pár rokov, keď jazyk prešiel dramatickými zmenami, najnovšia verzia prináša len zopár zmien. Ukážeme si tri podstatnejšie zmeny.
articles.title: Novinky C# 12

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Velký zájem o nové eDoklady přetížil dnes Identitu občana. Ministerstvo práce a sociálních věcí také hlásí problémy s přihlašováním do jejich aplikace Jenda.
articles.title: Velký zájem o eDoklady přetížil Identitu občana

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Nedávno bylo schváleno zavedení eDokladů, ke kterému mělo dojít v lednu letošního roku. Slíbená aplikace eDoklady už je dostupná pro Android. Pro iOS bude brzy, ještě dnes nebo zítra. Pro nahrání občanského průkazu budete potřebovat Identitu občana. V ní se prokazujete několika způsoby, například Bankovní identitou nebo MojeID.
articles.title: Aplikace eDoklady už je pro Android, pro iOS bude brzy

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Ve věku 85 let ve středu zemřel David L. Mills. V roce 1985 vytvořil NTP (network time protocol), kterým se synchronizuje přesný čas mezi počítači prakticky doposud.
articles.title: Ve věku 85 let zemřel David L. Mills, vynálezce NTP

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Bezpečnostní experti z firmy Trail of Bits v úterý zveřejnili zranitelnost GPU Apple, Qualcomm a AMD nazvanou LeftoverLocals (CVE-2023–4969). GPU NVIDIA a ARM nejsou zranitelné. Jde o nedostatečné mazání grafické paměti při použití AI. Potom jiný proces může číst například výstupy velkého jazykového modelu.
articles.title: Zranitelnost GPU LeftoverLocals

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Redakce)
articles.description: Chcete se stát datovým analytikem s přesahem do datového inženýrství a v budoucnu se věnovat třeba i strojovému učení či AI? Pak je tu pro vás půlroční intenzivní kurz Datový analytik s Pythonem, kterým vás jednou týdně ve 24 lekcích provedou zkušení lektoři s komerční praxí. Nejbližší kurz začíná už 15. února.
articles.title: Staňte se datovým analytikem s Pythonem (školení)

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Tradiční konference InstallFest se letos v březnu opět uskuteční, zapište si do kalendáře víkend 16. a 17. března. Na akci se setkávají začátečníci s ostřílenými linuxáky, kteří jim pomáhají s nejrůznějšími problémy, které vyžadují více zkušeností. Setkání proběhne opět na FEL ČVUT na Karlově náměstí v Praze.
articles.title: InstallFest proběhne 16. a 17. března, přihlaste svou přednášku

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Hans Reiser, tvůrce souborového systému ReiserFS, je v současnosti za vraždu ve vězení. Fredrick Brennan mu napsal dopis a před pár měsíci obdržel dlouhou odpověď, kterou nyní zveřejnil na LKML.
articles.title: Hans Reiser se omluvil za svoje chyby

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Vilém Sládek)
articles.description: Tento pátek je posledním dnem, kdy je možné se přihlásit na komunitní setkání nejen českých a slovenských správců sítí – CSNOG 2024. Akce se koná 23. a 24. ledna na Univerzitě Tomáše Bati ve Zlíně.
articles.title: Blíží se CSNOG 2024, registrace končí 19. ledna

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Na konci minulého týdne jsme psali o tom, že Linus Torvalds je kvůli zimní bouři odříznut od internetu a přestal tedy pracovat na vývoji jádra. Linus průběžně informoval na Mastodonu o zlepšující se situaci, podle poslední zprávy se začalo oteplovat a dodavatel elektřiny slibuje brzké obnovení dodávek. Lidé prý už začínají vyjíždět auty ven, což podle všeho ještě není úplně bezpečné. Nemám zájem účastnit se tohoto konkrétního kontaktního sportu, a proto stále nevycházím z domu, i když obavy ze zamrzlých trubek pomalu mizí, píše Linus.
articles.title: Linus Torvalds je zpět a přijímá kód pro jádro 6.8

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Vláda včera schválila materiál Ministerstva průmyslu a obchodu (MPO) nazvaný „Restart zavádění technologie DNSSEC a IPv6 ve státní správě“. V něm ministerstvo navrhlo vládě v podpoře rozvoje IPv6 protokolu zařadit vyšší rychlost a ve střednědobém horizontu ukončit poskytování služeb prostřednictvím protokolu IPv4 ve státní správě.
articles.title: Služby státní správy přestanou být v roce 2032 provozovány na protokolu IPv4

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: AV Linux v nové verzi přechází ze základu MX-21 a Debian 11 na MX-23 a Debian 12. S tím se pojí třeba přechod na novější verzi prostředí Enlightenment 0.25.4 a také přechod na PipeWire 1.0.0 jakožto zvukový systém a upravené linuxové jádro 6.6.9.
articles.title: AV Linux MX Edition 23.1 „Enlightened“, nová verze na A/V zaměřené distribuce

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Nové verze jak samotného X.Org Serveru, tak překladové vrstvy XWayland jsou na světě a jejich jediným účelem je oprava šestice dalších nalezených chyb. Konkrétně jde o CVE-2023–6816 (ke které vede chybný index pole DeviceFocusEvent či ProcXIQueryPointer. Dále CVE-2024–0229, v rámci něhož se opravuje chyba týkající se tříd kláves a tlačítek a přístupu do paměti, CVE-2024–21885 týkající se nakládání s ID zařízení vedoucímu k buffer overflow.
articles.title: X.Org Server 21.1.11 a Xwayland 23.2.4 opravují šest chyb

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Redakce)
articles.description: Už nějakou dobu provozujeme svůj účet na decentralizované síti Mastodon, konkrétně na instanci MastodonCzech.cz, kterou provozuje naše vydavatelství Internet Info. Posíláme tam odkazy na články a zprávičky, které u nás vycházejí. Pokud Mastodon používáte, můžete na něm sledovat všechny novinky nebo diskutovat nad jednotlivými tématy.
articles.title: Root.cz na Mastodonu, sledujte nás na decentralizované síti

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Redakce)
articles.description: Apache je jeden z nejrozšířenějších a nejpoužívanějších webových server současnosti, na školení Web server Apache se ho naučíme instalovat, spravovat a ladit pro co nejhladší běh našich služeb. Vše si vyzkoušíte prakticky na ostrém serveru, na kterém budete mít možnost provozovat skutečný web a ovlivňovat jeho nastavení.
articles.title: Naučte se používat web server Apache (školení)

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Vývojáři uvolnili Wine verze 9.0, které představuje rok vývoje a více než 7 000 jednotlivých změn. Mezi hlavní novinky patří nová architektura WoW64, která umožňuje využít 64bitová volání z 32bitového kódu. To znamená, že je možné spouštět 32bitové aplikace systému Windows na čistě 64bitové instalaci hostitelského systému. V původním řešení bylo nutné pro běh 32bitové aplikace spouštět 32bitový hostitelský proces. Nový režim není zatím ve výchozím stavu zapnutý a je nutné ho povolit v konfiguraci.
articles.title: Wine 9.0 vylepšuje podporu 32bitových aplikací a experimentuje s Waylandem

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Fortinet oznamuje bezpečné síťové řešení s podporou Wi-Fi 7. Sedm technologických trendů: využití API pro umělou inteligenci a vývoj softwaru s pomocí AI. Podle IDC se výdaje na řešení GenAI letos zdvojnásobí a v roce 2027 vzrostou na 151 miliard dolarů. Polovina firem zažila v roce 2023 kybernetický útok nebo incident, který jim znemožnil přístup k datům. Přístupové údaje do eGovernmentu nepatří.
articles.title: Týden na ITBiz: Polovina firem zažila v roce 2023 kybernetický útok nebo incident, který jim znemožnil přístup k datům

Na Goodoffer24.com totiž prodáváme doživotní licence na Windows  10 a Windows 11 s velkými slevami. K tomu ještě máme speciální promokód, díky kterému jsou ceny ještě nižší.

articles.description: GFI Software: pouze 31 % SMB firem je dobře připraveno na kybernetický útok. Vědci navrhli novou podobu Turingova testu pro éru umělé inteligence. 2024: rok útoků pomocí AI. Datová centra jako klíčová úložiště. Nové počítače Swift Go přinášejí umělou inteligenci a procesory Intel Core Ultra. Nová řada notebooků Dell XPS: Futuristický design s vestavěnou umělou inteligencí.

Nově jsou k dispozici upstream balíčky pro Ubuntu, Debian a Linux Mint. Řešeny jsou rovněž bezpečnostní chyby. Nový Firefox 122 je již k dispozici také na Flathubu a Snapcraftu.

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Problémy s Identitou občana přetrvávají. Problémy má například eRecept (V souvislosti se spuštěním mobilní aplikace eDoklady je aktuálně téměř nedostupná identifikace osoby v základních registrech a Identitou občana. Vzhledem k tomu, že tuto identifikaci využívá i systém eRecept (vyzvednutí léků prostřednictvím dokladu totožnosti, přihlášení se do aplikací eRecept), tak aktuální nedostupnost identifikačního prostředku způsobuje problémy i zde.) nebo Jenda MPSV (Evidujeme problémy s přihlašováním NIA). Ministerstvo práce a sociálních věcí se navíc stalo terčem útoku typu DDoS.
articles.title: Problémy s Identitou občana přetrvávají.  MPSV terčem útoku typu DDoS

With the Intel ANV Mesa driver you can now generate Radeon Memory Visualizer (RMV) compatible dumps that can then be loaded into the GPUOpen software for analyzing the video memory behavior of Intel's integrated and discrete graphics...

At least though the out-of-tree patches continue to be quickly re-based and decrease in size over time... articles.description: The review embargo has now expired on the Framework Laptop 16, the latest innovative and upgradeable laptop from this company that has made quite a name for itself with modular and user-upgradeable laptop designs for both AMD and Intel. The new Framework Laptop 16 offers even more customizability around the keyboard/touchpad and other options including over using a Radeon RX 7700S graphics module and more. Besides the immense customizability options and upgrades available with the Framework Laptop 16, the new model employs the AMD Ryzen 7040HS processor for even greater performance over the AMD Ryzen 7040U found with the latest Framework 13 model.
